telephony_white_label_manager_descrition: The White-label Manager offers a customisable interface in your company's colours for managing OVHcloud Telecom services.
telephony_white_label_manager_checkbox_l: I want to reset my White-label Manager password.
telephony_white_label_manager_reset_pass: This procedure will reset your White-label Manager password.
This action will disable all user accounts in the Control Panel, and require you to reconfigure their passwords.
An error has occurred resetting the password. Please try again later.
